Title: Dragon Ball Z: Tree of Might
Writer: Akira Toriyama (original manga "Dragon Ball"), Takao Koyama (screenplay), Eric Vale (English script)
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Tôru Furuya, Hirotaka Suzuoki
Plot: A Saiyan named Turles has come to Earth in order to plant the Tree of Might, which will sap all of the life from earth in order to bear fruit that will greatly increase the strength of whoever eats it. Goku and the Z Warriors cannot let this happen and duke it out with Turles's group for the sake of the planet.
